data.description: JOIN PEAK See Open Positions Peak Values, Not Just Words On The Wall Own It & Get It Done, Transparency No B.S., Don't Be A Jerk, Do The Right Thing, Be A Team Player, Steady In The Storm .hdg__ocean_content .hdg__ocean_content-divider{ background-color: var(--accentColorTwo); height:3px; margin:10px 0 5px; max-width: 80px; width:100%; } .hdg__ocean_wrap{ position:relative; padding:10px 0 25px; } .hdg__ocean_content-h{ margin-top:5px; margin-bottom:0; display:inline-block } .hdg__ocean_content-wp{ display:grid; } .hdg__ocean_content-icon{ margin-top: 10px; padding-right: 10px; max-width: 45px; height: 45px; width: 45px; } .hdg__ocean_content-icon img{ max-width: 100%!important; height: 100%!important; object-fit: contain; } .hdg__ocean_content-title-tag{ margin-bottom:0px; border-radius:var(--cornerRadius); width: auto; } .hdg__ocean_content__p{ display: flex; width: 100%; } .hdg__ocean_content__p-el{ margin-top:15px; padding:0; } .hdg__ocean_content-title{ display: flex; flex-direction: column; position:relative; } .hdg__ocean_content-title.sync a{ position:absolute; top:-10px; } .hdg__ocean_more-link{ flex: 0 0 auto; margin-left: 10px; } .hdg__ocean_see-more{ display: flex; align-items: center; grid-gap: 10px; line-height: 1; } .hs-inline-edit .hdg__ocean_content-title:hover:before { color: #333; content: attr(data-anchor); position: absolute; font-size: 12px; top: -40px; left: 0; padding: 5px; background: #f8f8fd; border-radius: 3px; white-space: nowrap; } Working at Peak Deciding to join a new company is not to be taken lightly, and we want you to make an informed decision. Peak is growing rapidly, and this requires the right team.We want our team to embrace a shared mission and purpose for joining Peak. Our most impactful hires often originate from employee referrals and peer networks. Our goal is for you to feel integral to the company with a meaningful purpose, fostering both personal career growth and collective company success. See Open Positions PEAK BENEFITS Insurance Comprehensive options for Medical, Dental, Vision, and Disability coverage. 401K 401K match provided by Peak Nano, enhancing employee retirement savings. Remote Work Peak offers the flexibility of working remotely for applicable positions. PTO Peak prioritizes work-life balance with allocated personal time off. Career opportunities All Optics Business Unit Films Business Unit Internship Macedonia, OH AI/ML Developmental CO-OP – Spring ‘26 Peak is seeking AI/ML CO-OP to build software that uses AI to improve physical processes in LGRIN lens manufacturing. Apply Remote Applied Optical Scientist Peak Nano is looking for an Optical Scientist with in-depth knowledge of optics and optical software development. Apply Remote Content Marketing Videographer Co-op – Spring ‘26 Peak is looking for a Videographer Co-Op to join our team and help produce engaging, high-impact video content across marketing, sales, and education. Apply Cleveland, OH DevOps Engineer II Peak is seeking a DevOps engineer with a good cultural fit to help build out the digital infrastructure. Apply Cleveland, OH Extrusion Technician Peak is seeking an Extrusion Technician. This is an incredible opportunity to help advance our ground-breaking technology. Apply Valley View, OH Facilities, Maintenance and EH&S Director Peak is seeking an EH&S Director to oversee facilities and maintenance. Apply Macedonia, OH Industrial Maintenance Technician Peak Nano is seeking an Industrial Maintenance Technician, responsible for inspections, repairs, and preventive maintenance on equipment and building systems while ensuring safety and efficiency. Apply Macedonia, OH IT CO-OP – Spring ‘26 Peak Nano is looking for an Information Technology CO-OP to join our IT department in the Spring Session. Apply Macedonia, OH IT Internship – Summer ‘26 Peak Nano is looking for an Information Technology Intern to join our IT department in the Summer Session. Apply Valley View, OH Manufacturing Engineer II, Extrusion Peak is seeking a Manufacturing Engineer II, Extrusion to develop and optimize Optical Film via patented nanolayer cast film co-extrusion process. Apply Macedonia, OH Materials Program Manager Peak is seeking a Materials Program Manager to lead inventory, POs, logistics, reporting, and BOM management. Apply Macedonia, OH Principal Opto-Mechanical Engineer Peak Nano is seeking an innovative Principal Opto-Mechanical Engineer with demonstrated experience bringing new opto-mechanical products to market. Apply Macedonia, OH Principal Software Engineer Peak is seeking a highly skilled Software Architect with deep experience designing both SaaS (Software as a Service) and on-premises enterprise applications. Apply Valley View, OH Process Engineering Internship – Summer ‘26 Peak is seeking a Process Engineering Intern for the Summer ‘26 session. Apply Macedonia, OH Quality Control Supervisor Peak Nano is seeking a Quality Control Supervisor responsible for overseeing quality control activities in an Optical Device manufacturing environment. Apply Valley View, OH Research Engineering Internship – Summer ‘26 Peak is seeking a Research Engineering Intern for the Summer ‘26 session. Apply Macedonia, OH Software Engineer Intern – Summer ‘26 Peak is seeking a Software Engineer Intern for the Summer ‘26 session. Apply Valley View, OH Sr Research Scientist Peak is seeking a Sr. Research Scientist to lead polymer product development, driving innovation and growth in existing and emerging markets. Apply Macedonia, OH Sr Software Engineer Peak is seeking a Sr Software Engineer who will support Peaks’ manufacturing & AI/Ml data infrastructure. Apply Valley View, OH VP of Manufacturing Peak is seeking an experienced VP of Manufacturing to lead operations at a fast-growing, innovative nanotechnology company. Apply Get the Latest Peak News Sign up for Peak's Newsletter with your business email address. Contact Peak
